# Temporary exceptions for scripts/ci_migration_guard.py
#
# Format (pipe-delimited; 4 fields):
# path_glob|signal_regex|expires_yyyy-mm-dd|reason
#
# Guardrails:
# - Expiry must be today..today+30 days.
# - Keep entries narrowly scoped and remove as soon as migration/logic is fixed.
# - Prefer adding the real Alembic migration whenever possible.
#
# Example:
# src/ha_backend/search.py|app DDL detected: .*CREATE TEMP TABLE.*|2026-02-20|False positive: temp-table query plan change does not persist schema
